# PETREL-CLASS CARGO TUG
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Medium
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 2-4
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] Uranium
[color=#a4885c]Expeditions:[/color] No
[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] None
"A medium sized space forklift from the USSP-based Kesha Aerospace Plant, with a massive vacuum-exposed cargo rack ready to shove station-constructing loads of material wherever you need it to go!"
"The Petrel is designed around two unique components; the ship itself, which is based on an old tug design, and the large vacuum-exposed cargo rack. Be sure to wear EVA gear when operating the Emu PLUs!"
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC unit's current Load* (W).
## 1.2. S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit
- Open radiation shielding. - Check if the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is anchored to the floor. - Check if the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit has fuel. For extended flights make sure that you have enough fuel stockpiled to sustain prolonged power generation during flight. - Check if the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is set to HV output. - Set Target Power for 40 [bold]k[/bold]W. - Start the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit. - Close radiation shielding.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the O2 canister is anchored to connector port. - Check that the N2 canister is anchored to connector port. - Check that the gas mixer is set to the correct mixing ratio (21% Oxygen, 79% Nitrogen). - Check that the gas mixer is set to 101kPa. - Enable gas mixer.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Enable waste loop pump (located in ore silo/gyroscope room).
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Ensure shutter and bolt switches are functional.
